newark.neighborhoods: Downtown, Ironbound, University Heights, Weequahic, North Newark
newark.meetingHighlights: Large urban fellowship with numerous downtown and neighborhood meetings, many evening and newcomer-friendly options.
newark.transitInfo: NJ Transit, PATH, and local buses provide regional connections; Newark Liberty International Airport (EWR) serves the metro.

jersey-city.neighborhoods: Downtown, Journal Square, Newport, The Heights, McGinley Square
jersey-city.meetingHighlights: Urban, commuter-friendly meetings with many evening and lunchtime options; strong cross-river connections with NYC groups.
jersey-city.transitInfo: PATH, NJ Transit, and light rail connect Jersey City to Manhattan and the region; close to Newark Liberty International Airport.

paterson.meetingHighlights: Neighborhood-centered meetings with active evening groups and several culturally specific meetings.
paterson.transitInfo: NJ Transit commuter rail and buses connect Paterson to the region; close to major highways and NYC access.

elizabeth.meetingHighlights: Community meetings with regular speaker nights and strong weekday attendance from nearby industrial and residential neighborhoods.
elizabeth.transitInfo: NJ Transit trains and buses serve Elizabeth; Newark Liberty International Airport nearby.

princeton.meetingHighlights: College-town meetings with student-friendly schedules and a mix of study and speaker formats; strong newcomer support.
princeton.transitInfo: NJ Transit and Amtrak connections via nearby stations; proximity to major highways and regional airports.

trenton.neighborhoods: Downtown, Mill Hill, Chambersburg, North Trenton, West Trenton
trenton.meetingHighlights: Capital-city meetings with active lunchtime groups for state workers; diverse neighborhood meetings with Spanish-language options.
trenton.transitInfo: NJ Transit trains and buses serve Trenton; Trenton-Mercer Airport (TTN) and Philadelphia International Airport (PHL) nearby.
